Bash(# Move web files to app/web
mv src/web-ui/revenue_cloud_structured_web_poc.py app/web/main.py 2>/dev/null || true

# Move data processing files to app/data
mv src/data-processing/*.py app/data/ 2>/dev/null || true

# Move utilities to app/utils
mv src/utilities/*.py app/utils/ 2>/dev/null || true

# Keep docs in project root since they're project-specific
echo "Files reorganized")
